member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_QUERY_TYPE
member.summary: TheHTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_QUERY_TYPE enumeration type defines various types of queries to make. It is used in the, , and structures.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_QUERY_TYPE.HttpServiceConfigQueryExact
member.summary: The query returns a single record that matches the specified key value.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_QUERY_TYPE.HttpServiceConfigQueryNext
member.summary: The query iterates through the store and returns all records in sequence, using an index value that the calling process increments between query calls.

member.name: HTTP_SERVICE_CONFIG_QUERY_TYPE.HttpServiceConfigQueryMax
member.summary: Terminates the enumeration; is not used to define a query type.
